description: A current drive overview of your car

panels.description:
This is a special dashboard to load while driving. When you open this dashboard it will show the last 15 minutes, but you should click the "Current Drive" button at the top right corner, to enter in Kiosk mode:

 - If you are driving, you will see the information from the start time of the current drive until now and it will refesh automatically every 30 seconds.

 - If you are just browsing (not driving) you will see the information of the last drive.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	$__time(date),
	avg(power) AS Power,
	avg(battery_heater::integer) AS "Battery heater",
	avg(convert_km(speed::numeric, '$length_unit')) AS speed_${length_unit}h
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1  
ORDER BY
	date ASC

SELECT
	$__time(date),
	AVG(ROUND(convert_m(elevation, '$alternative_length_unit'))) AS elevation_${alternative_length_unit}
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1 
ORDER BY
	date ASC

panels.title: Drive

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(date),
  latitude,
  longitude
FROM positions
WHERE 
  car_id = $car_id AND 
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY 
  date ASC

with drives_start_event as (

    select
        'drive_start' as event, start_date as date, start_${preferred_range}_range_km as range, start_km as odometer, car_id
    from drives
    where car_id = $car_id and $__timeFilter(start_date) and 48 <= extract(hour FROM to_timestamp(${__to:date:seconds}) - to_timestamp(${__from:date:seconds}))

),

drives_end_event as (

    select
        'drive_end' as event, end_date as date, end_${preferred_range}_range_km as range, end_km as odometer, car_id
    from drives
    where car_id = $car_id and $__timeFilter(end_date) and 48 <= extract(hour FROM to_timestamp(${__to:date:seconds}) - to_timestamp(${__from:date:seconds}))

),

charging_processes_start_event as (

    select
        'charging_process_start' as event, start_date as date, start_${preferred_range}_range_km as range, p.odometer, cp.car_id
    from charging_processes cp
        inner join positions p on cp.position_id = p.id
    where cp.car_id = $car_id and $__timeFilter(start_date) and 48 <= extract(hour FROM to_timestamp(${__to:date:seconds}) - to_timestamp(${__from:date:seconds}))

),

charging_processes_end_event as (

    select
        'charging_process_end' as event, end_date as date, end_${preferred_range}_range_km as range, p.odometer, cp.car_id
    from charging_processes cp
        inner join positions p on cp.position_id = p.id
    where cp.car_id = $car_id and $__timeFilter(end_date) and 48 <= extract(hour FROM to_timestamp(${__to:date:seconds}) - to_timestamp(${__from:date:seconds}))

),

positions as (

    select
        case
            when drive_id is not null and lead(drive_id) over w is not null then 'drive_start'
            else 'something'
        end as event,
        date, ${preferred_range}_battery_range_km as range, p.odometer, p.car_id
    from positions p
    where ideal_battery_range_km is not null and car_id = $car_id and $__timeFilter(date) and 48 > extract(hour FROM to_timestamp(${__to:date:seconds}) - to_timestamp(${__from:date:seconds}))
    window w as (order by date)

),

combined as (

    select * from drives_start_event
    union all
    select * from drives_end_event
    union all
    select * from charging_processes_start_event
    union all
    select * from charging_processes_end_event
    union all
    select * from positions

),

final as (

    select
        car_id,
        lead(odometer) over w - odometer as distance,
        case when event != 'drive_start' then greatest(range - lead(range) over w, 0) else range - lead(range) over w end as range_loss
    from combined
    window w as (order by date asc)

)

select
    (sum(range_loss) * c.efficiency * 1000) / nullif(convert_km(sum(distance)::numeric, '$length_unit'), 0) as consumption_$length_unit
from final
    inner join cars c on car_id = c.id
group by c.efficiency

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval), avg(convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit')) as outdoor_$temp_unit 
FROM positions 
WHERE car_id = $car_id AND outside_temp IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval), avg(convert_celsius(inside_temp, '$temp_unit')) as inside_$temp_unit 
FROM positions 
WHERE car_id = $car_id AND outside_temp IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval), avg(convert_celsius(driver_temp_setting, '$temp_unit')) as driver_$temp_unit 
FROM positions 
WHERE car_id = $car_id AND outside_temp IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit') as "distance_$length_unit"
  FROM positions
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND ideal_battery_range_km is not null

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
	AVG(convert_km(speed::numeric, '$length_unit')) AS speed_${length_unit}h
FROM
	positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY 1

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(convert_km(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km, '$length_unit')) as range_$length_unit
FROM positions
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND car_id=$car_id AND ${preferred_range}_battery_range_km is not null
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 DESC LIMIT 1

select $__time(date), convert_km(odometer::numeric, '$length_unit')  as "odometer_$length_unit"
from positions 
where drive_id = $current_drive 
order by date desc 
limit 1;

(SELECT battery_level, date
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)
UNION
SELECT battery_level, date
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1

(SELECT battery_level * $BatteryCapacity / 100 as kWh, date, $BatteryCapacity as Total
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)
UNION
SELECT battery_level * $BatteryCapacity / 100 as kWh, date, $BatteryCapacity as Total
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1

list.definition:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC;

list.definition: select case when unit_of_length = 'km' then 'm' when unit_of_length = 'mi' then 'ft' end  from settings limit 1;
list.name: alternative_length_unit
list.query: select case when unit_of_length = 'km' then 'm' when unit_of_length = 'mi' then 'ft' end  from settings limit 1;

list.definition: SELECT drive_id FROM positions WHERE car_id = $car_id AND drive_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;
list.name: current_drive
list.query: SELECT drive_id FROM positions WHERE car_id = $car_id AND drive_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;

list.definition:
SELECT 
  (round(extract(epoch FROM start_date) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts
  FROM drives 
   WHERE id = $current_drive
list.name: current_drive_start_time
list.query:
SELECT 
  (round(extract(epoch FROM start_date) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts
  FROM drives 
   WHERE id = $current_drive

list.definition:
SELECT 
  CASE WHEN end_date IS NULL THEN 'now&refresh=10s' 
  ELSE CAST(round(extract(epoch FROM end_date) - 10) * 1000 AS VARCHAR(100)) END
  FROM drives
  WHERE id = $current_drive
list.name: current_drive_end_time
list.query:
SELECT 
  CASE WHEN end_date IS NULL THEN 'now&refresh=10s' 
  ELSE CAST(round(extract(epoch FROM end_date) - 10) * 1000 AS VARCHAR(100)) END
  FROM drives
  WHERE id = $current_drive

list.definition:
SELECT
    AVG(Capacity) AS Capacity
FROM (
    SELECT 
        c.rated_battery_range_km * $efficiency / c.usable_battery_level AS Capacity
    FROM charging_processes cp
        INNER JOIN charges c ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id 
    WHERE
        cp.car_id = $car_id
        AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
        AND cp.charge_energy_added >= $efficiency
        AND c.usable_battery_level > 0
    ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC
    LIMIT 100
)
list.name: BatteryCapacity
list.query:
SELECT
    AVG(Capacity) AS Capacity
FROM (
    SELECT 
        c.rated_battery_range_km * $efficiency / c.usable_battery_level AS Capacity
    FROM charging_processes cp
        INNER JOIN charges c ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id 
    WHERE
        cp.car_id = $car_id
        AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
        AND cp.charge_energy_added >= $efficiency
        AND c.usable_battery_level > 0
    ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC
    LIMIT 100
)

list.definition:
SELECT
    COALESCE(derived_efficiency, car_efficiency) AS efficiency
FROM (
    SELECT
        ROUND((charge_energy_added / NULLIF(end_rated_range_km - start_rated_range_km, 0))::numeric, 3) * 100 AS derived_efficiency,
        COUNT(*) as count,
        cars.id as car_id,
        cars.efficiency * 100 AS car_efficiency
    FROM cars
        LEFT JOIN charging_processes ON
            cars.id = charging_processes.car_id 
            AND duration_min > 10
            AND end_battery_level <= 95
            AND start_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
            AND end_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
            AND charge_energy_added > 0
    WHERE cars.id = $car_id
    GROUP BY 1, 3, 4
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 1
)
list.name: efficiency
list.query:
SELECT
    COALESCE(derived_efficiency, car_efficiency) AS efficiency
FROM (
    SELECT
        ROUND((charge_energy_added / NULLIF(end_rated_range_km - start_rated_range_km, 0))::numeric, 3) * 100 AS derived_efficiency,
        COUNT(*) as count,
        cars.id as car_id,
        cars.efficiency * 100 AS car_efficiency
    FROM cars
        LEFT JOIN charging_processes ON
            cars.id = charging_processes.car_id 
            AND duration_min > 10
            AND end_battery_level <= 95
            AND start_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
            AND end_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
            AND charge_energy_added > 0
    WHERE cars.id = $car_id
    GROUP BY 1, 3, 4
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 1
)

title: Current Drive View
